Articles.Content: I'm wondering if anybody knows of any mod that changes the look of kerbin to earth. I would like to use it with KerbinSide to have a more realistic feel but with stock physics.
What you can do is download RSS, only keep the Earth texture, and scale it down by 10 to achieve the same size for Kerbin/Earth as in the stock game.

On 9/2/2018 at 5:41 PM, Benjamin Kerman said:
